product_name: BIC Sport Fiber S Stand Up Paddle - Women's
long_description: Made with a lightweight carbon fiber shaft and fiberglass blade, this adjustable stand up paddle has a small blade that is ideal for smaller paddlers and those who prefer high-cadence paddling.
short_description: Made with a lightweight carbon fiber shaft and fiberglass blade, this adjustable stand up paddle has a small blade that is ideal for smaller paddlers and those who prefer high-cadence paddling.
